main event: A UFO sighting involving a round white to dim yellow light observed by multiple witnesses near Kirknewton and Dalkeith, Scotland on September 29, 1959.
interesting points: The observed object had an unusual brilliance and was reported to be 12-22 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted between 5 to 7 minutes,Multiple witnesses reported seeing the same object from different locations,No sound or exhaust was detected from the object,The object was flying at an altitude of less than 1000 feet and at speeds of approximately 7-10 knots.
sighted object: round white to dim yellow light
